title.jp: BPS Arrives! E-Mode vs. Super Computer, Guest Appearance by the King of America! Part 1

synopsis: BPS is recruited by an electronics company.  The king of America hacks a shipping company.

title.jp: BPS Arrives! E-Mode vs. Super Computer, Guest Appearance by the King of America! Part 2

synopsis: Misao Amano stops by to visit BPS.  A computer virus planted by King of America does some serious damage.

title.jp: BPS Arrives! E-Mode vs. Super Computer, Guest Appearance by the King of America! Part 3

synopsis: BPS and the King of America go head to head in a cell phone vs. super computer battle.

title.jp: Burning BPS! Seaside School in Swimsuits is Sweet but Dangerous, Misao-chan's Crisis! Part 1

synopsis: The coast guard recruits BPS. Misao Amano is planning on going to the beach.

title.jp: Burning BPS! Seaside School in Swimsuits is Sweet but Dangerous, Misao-chan's Crisis! Part 2

synopsis: King of America recruits some help. Misao Amano goes to the beach on a school trip while BPS goes to the Coast Guard HQ.

title.jp: Burning BPS! Seaside School in Swimsuits is Sweet but Dangerous, Misao-chan's Crisis! Part 3

synopsis: The situation at sea is starting to look bad. Misao Amano is in big trouble at the beach,

title.jp: BPS in Danger! The Brilliant Female Programmer is a Schoolkid? Part 1

synopsis: BPS is recruited to protect Japan's nuclear resources.  Misao Amano makes a new friend.

title.jp: BPS in Danger! The Brilliant Female Programmer is a Schoolkid? Part 2

synopsis: BPS bumps into an old college professor.  Misao's friend meets BPS.

title.jp: BPS in Danger! The Brilliant Female Programmer is a Schoolkid? Part 3

synopsis: Yoriko Yunoki is called back for an emergency.

title.jp: BPS Retiring! The Counterpart at the 'All is Vanity' Marriage Interview is Sae-sensei! Part 1

synopsis: BPS is forced to go to a marriage interview.

title.jp: BPS Retiring! The Counterpart at the 'All is Vanity' Marriage Interview is Sae-sensei! Part 2

synopsis: BPS tries to get out of his marriage interview and is recruited to stop King of America again.

title.jp: BPS Retiring! The Counterpart at the 'All is Vanity' Marriage Interview is Sae-sensei! Part 3
